intro: Eugenia psychotrioides, commonly known as the psychotrioides eugenia, is a species of flowering plant in the Myrtaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of fragrant white flowers. It produces small, fleshy berries that are typically red when mature. Eugenia psychotrioides is often found in moist, shaded areas within tropical forests.
